Viewing the View Menu

The View menu is always available on the main StarTeam window, regardless of the component selected from the upper pane. Depending upon the privileges assigned to you and the activities you need to perform, some options may not be enabled.

New...

Create a new view of the current project.

Delete

Delete a view from the current project.

Select View...

Launch another view.

Select Configuration...

Check out files in the current view based on a label or a date and time.

Profiles

Create, modify, or delete a view profile, which is a set of limitations applied to a view.

Properties

Review or change the current view’s properties.

Access Rights...

Review or change the current project's access rights.

Labels

Create, delete, or lock a view label or revision label.

Promotion...

Create, edit, or set promotion states. A promotion state is a way of grouping files as they progress through different stages to completion (for example, Develop, Test, and Distribute).

Compare/Merge...

Compare or merge different views.
